009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import java.awt.Font;
012import java.awt.Graphics2D;
013
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
016import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.image.ImageGraphics;
018
019/**
020 * This ImageJ plugin draws a test grid in a newly created image.
021 * It uses anti-aliased drawing operations provided by 
022 * imagingbook's {@link ImageGraphics} class.
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 * @version 2021/10/07
026 */
027public class Draw_Test_Grid implements PlugIn {
028        
029        static int W = 400;
030        static int H = 400;
031        static int xStep = 20;
032        static int yStep = 20;
033        static int xStart = 100;
034        static int yStart = 100;
035        static int xN = 10;
036        static int yN = 10;
037        
038        static int foreground = 0;
039        static int background = 255;
040        
041    public void run(String arg) {
042        ByteProcessor ip = new ByteProcessor(W, H);
043        ip.setValue(background);
044        ip.fill();
045        
046        try (ImageGraphics ig = new ImageGraphics(ip)) {
047                        ig.setColor(foreground);
048                        ig.setLineWidth(1.0);
049                        
050                        int y = yStart;
051                int x1 = xStart;
052                int x2 = xStart + xN * xStep;
053                        for (int j = 0; j <= yN; j++) {
054                                ig.drawLine(x1, y, x2, y);
055                                y = y + yStep;
056                        }
057                        
058                        int x = xStart;
059                        int y1 = yStart;
060                        int y2 = yStart + yN * yStep;
061                        for (int i = 0; i <= xN; i++) {
062                                ig.drawLine(x, y1, x, y2);
063                                x = x + xStep;
064                        }
065                        
066                        ig.drawLine(0, 0, W - 1, H - 1);
067                        ig.drawOval(xStart, yStart, W/2, H/2);
068                        
069                        Graphics2D g = ig.getGraphics2D();
070                        g.setFont(new Font(Font.SANS_SERIF, Font.PLAIN, 18));
071                        float xLeft = 8;
072                        float yTop  = 19;
073                        float xRight = W - 17;
074                        float yBot  = H - 10;
075                        g.drawString("1", xLeft, yTop);
076                        g.drawString("2", xRight, yTop);
077                        g.drawString("3", xRight, yBot);
078                        g.drawString("4", xLeft, yBot);
079        }
080        
081        new ImagePlus("Grid",ip).show();
082    }
083}
